name: Park It
description:
Park It as quick as you can, but avoid the obstacles and be careful over the speed bumps.

Made in about 4 weeks as part of my game a month project.

Controls:

W/S or Up/Down arrows - Accelerate/Brake/Reverse
A/D or Left/Right arrows - Steer

All art and code by Ash Kendall.
http://relevantdevelopment.co.uk

The main theme is Riverside Ride by Matthew Pablo.
http://www.matthewpablo.com/
